definitions: An insect related to the grasshoppers but with shorter legs, the male of which produces a characteristic chirping sound.
A game played with a bat and ball between two teams of 11 players, in which runs are scored by hitting the ball and running between two sets of wickets.
A small, usually metal, stand or support.
examples: The crickets chirped loudly in the field.
They played a game of crickets on the village green.
He placed the book on a small crickets.
